New Records: Ronald Acuña Jr. reached 37 home runs
Austin Riley became the third Braves player to reach 35 homers in a season, tying for most players with 35 homers in a season on one team in MLB history
Key Match Events: Austin Riley’s two-run homer in the first inning
Kevin Pillar added an RBI double in the fourth for a 4-1 lead
Spencer Strider allowed one run and four hits in seven innings, striking out nine
Post-Match Reflections: Braves manager Brian Snitker stated, 'We’ve checked one box'
Braves players responded to booing fans by raising both arms and signaling with their hands to bring it on
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies lead the NL wild card
The Braves have seemingly made winning the East a rite of September since the 1990s
Atlanta took special satisfaction in clinching on the same field where the Phillies eliminated them last October in the NL Division Series
